access: Knights of Lastwall have access to this feat.
markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Knight's Retaliation](/Feats.aspx?ID=3635) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=321" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 84</row>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3)

**Access**
Knights of Lastwall have access to this feat.

**Trigger**
An undead creature within your reach critically fails a Strike against you.

</column>

---

You knock the enemy's blow aside and twist, unbalancing your foe. You attempt to [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41), [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38), or [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40) the triggering creature.
name: Knight's Retaliation
